title: AIOU begins admission semester 2025 from July 01
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 29 (APP):Allama Iqbal Open University (AIOU) is set to open admissions for the Autumn 2025 semester from Tuesday( July 1) across the country.
According to a press release, the admissions will cover a wide range of academic programs from Matriculation to PhD level.
A major highlight of this semester is the launch of 17 new and modern Associate Degree programs. These have been carefully designed to align with current academic trends and evolving market demands, ensuring that students are equipped with relevant and practical skills.
Admissions will be offered through both Open and Distance Learning (ODL) as well as Face-to-Face programs. Detailed information regarding all programs, including prospectuses and online admission forms, will be available on the university’s official website: www.aiou.edu.pk starting July 1.
In line with the directions of Vice Chancellor Prof. Dr. Nasir Mahmood, AIOU’s regional campuses across the country will provide free computer and internet facilities to assist students in the online admission process. Trained staff will be available to offer full guidance and support to applicants.
Prospective students can obtain more information by visiting their nearest regional campus or by calling the university’s helpline at 051-111-112-468.
This is a golden opportunity for all those seeking quality and accessible education across Pakistan.
